name: Aguila Roja
description: Colombia's most popular lager, known for its light, refreshing taste with a subtle bitter touch.

name: Club Colombia Dorada
description: Premium lager recognized for its balanced, malty flavor. A multi-award-winning Colombian beer.

name: Poker Premium
description: Lager with a more intense, hoppy taste compared to traditional beers. Ideal for those seeking a bolder flavor.

description: Perfect for hot climates, this light and refreshing lager boasts low alcohol and calorie content.

name: Andina Premium
description: Craft lager made with high-quality ingredients. Offers a smooth, balanced taste with a hint of roasted malt.

name: Tequendama Golden Ale
description: Renowned craft ale known for its fruity and spicy notes. A unique, refreshing option for those who enjoy flavorful beers.

name: La Oveja Negra Stout
description: Craft stout brewed with oats and coffee. Features a dark, complex flavor with hints of chocolate and caramel.

name: 3.3 Golden Ale
description: Craft ale brewed with Colombian hops. Delivers a citrusy, refreshing taste with a touch of pine.

name: Aguila Cero
description: Alcohol-free lager for those who want to enjoy the taste of beer without the effects of alcohol.
